name: Lina Araya
routine: Lina Araya sleeps at around 10pm and wakes up at 6:30 am for school.
occupation: Lina is a high school student, with before-school soccer practice and study sessions occupying her weekdays.
thoughts: She has been admiring the new mural in her school's art department, completed on February 2nd, 2024, and is inspired to join the art club.
lifestyle: Lina favors Central American dishes, spends her free time exploring the city with friends, and is always on the lookout for new experiences.

name: Liam Murphy
routine: Liam goes to bed at around 10:30pm and wakes up at 6am to take his dog for a run.
occupation: Liam is a secondary school teacher, teaching history. He works from 8am to 4pm and occasionally tutors in the evenings.
thoughts: He's been excitedly setting up a new interactive history exhibit for his students, with the launch happening on February 4th, 2024.
lifestyle: Liam opts for a hearty Irish diet with an appreciation for stews and bread. He enjoys woodworking in his shed as a form of relaxation and often experiments with crafting traditional furniture. His home reflects a rustic and cozy décor theme.

name: Carlos Rodriguez
routine: Carlos enjoys a restful sleep from 10:30pm to 6am, then spends an hour reading the newspaper before starting his day.
occupation: Carlos is a retired banker in Madrid, but he often provides financial advice to friends and family.
thoughts: Carlos is concerned about the fluctuating European markets and is considering adjusting his investment portfolio.
lifestyle: Carlos loves Spanish cuisine, particularly tapas, and cultivates his own vegetables for his cooking. He enjoys long walks with his dog and afternoon siestas.

name: Liam Johnson
routine: Liam Johnson generally goes to bed around midnight and wakes up at 7am for his college classes.
occupation: Liam Johnson is a college sophomore studying Graphic Design. He often spends nights working on projects.
thoughts: Liam Johnson is preparing for his mid-term exams for the week of February 1st and is feeling slightly stressed about the workload.
lifestyle: Liam Johnson loves skateboarding and often uses it as his mode of transportation around campus and the city.
